title: LENOVO LEGION PRO 7 16IRX9H 16" I9-14900HX/32GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4080 12GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплей:16" (40.64cm)
Резолуција:WQXGA (2560x1600), IPS 500nits Anti-glare, 100% DCI-P3, 240Hz, DisplayHDR™ 400, Dolby® Vision®, G-SYNC®, Low Blue Light, High Gaming Performance
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i9-14900HX, 24C (8P + 16E) / 32T, P-core 2.2 / 5.8GHz, E-core 1.6 / 4.1GHz, 36MB
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4080 12GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2280MHz, TGP 175W
Внатрешна меморија:32GB DDR5-5600
Мемовија:1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:    High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3306 codec
Звучници:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, audio by HARMAN, optimized with Nahimic Audio, Smart Amplifier (AMP)
Камера:FHD 1080p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Ethernet:100/1000M (RJ-45)
Intel® Killer Wi-Fi® 6E AX1675i, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.3
RGB Backlit (with Lighting Lens)
Порти:
1x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), Always On
3x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1)
1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with Lenovo® PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4
1x USB-C® (Thunderbolt™ 4 / USB4® 40Gbps), with DisplayPort™ 1.4
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x Power connector
Power Adapter:330W Slim Tip Tiny GaN (3-pin)
Батерија:Integrated 99.9Wh

features.audio_feature_1: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, audio by HARMAN, optimized with Nahimic Audio, Smart Amplifier (AMP)
